title: Hour 2: Snyders Selling
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Jay Williams, JJ Redick, and Amar'e Stoudemire discuss the news that Steve Nash is out as Brooklyn's Head Coach and debate how well the situation with Kyrie was handled by the Nets organization. We have Breaking News reaction from Adam Schefter, Marcus Spears, Kimberly A. Martin, and Chris "Mad Dog" Russo as Commanders owner Dan Snyder announces he's exploring a potential sale of the team. Redick and Russo debate whether or not the Nets season can be saved in the wake of Nash's exit and their Kyrie controversy.

itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: We follow Breaking News as Commanders owner Dan Snyder explores selling the team
